ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisApproval of the CANADIAN NUCLEAR SAFETY COMMISSION COST RECOVERY FEES REGULATIONS which establish a method of calculating fees using estimates of actual effort and cost for major licences and a standard-hour or prescribed fee method to calculate fees for other regulatory work.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0212 Publication Date: 2003-06-18

precis: Approval of the CANADIAN NUCLEAR SAFETY COMMISSION COST RECOVERY FEES REGULATIONS which establish a method of calculating fees using estimates of actual effort and cost for major licences and a standard-hour or prescribed fee method to calculate fees for other regulatory work.
